021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.io.maps.MultiTreeMap;
024import net.tnemc.core.manager.TopManager;
025
026import java.util.UUID;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028
029import static net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager.TOP_PER_PAGE;
030
031/**
032 * TopCurrency
033 *
034 * @author creatorfromhell
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public class TopCurrency {
038
039  private final MultiTreeMap<String> balances = new MultiTreeMap<>(TOP_PER_PAGE);
040
041  private final String region;
042  private final UUID currency;
043
044  public TopCurrency(final String region, final UUID currency) {
045
046    this.region = region;
047    this.currency = currency;
048
049    load();
050    balances.sort();
051  }
052
053  public UUID getCurrency() {
054
055    return currency;
056  }
057
058  public void load() {
059
060    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
061      if(excluded(account.getName())) continue;
062
063      balances.put(account.getHoldingsTotal(region, currency), account.getName());
064    }
065  }
066
067  public boolean excluded(final String name) {
068
069    for(final Pattern pattern : TopManager.instance().getRegexExclusions()) {
070      if(pattern.matcher(name).matches()) return true;
071    }
072
073    for(final String str : TopManager.instance().getExclusions()) {
074      if(name.contains(str)) return true;
075    }
076    return false;
077  }
078
079  public MultiTreeMap<String> getBalances() {
080
081    return balances;
082  }
083}
